title: Topic 001 Question 040
body: When using a module block to reference a module stored on the public Terraform Module Registry such as:
options: Modules stored on the public Terraform Module Registry do not support versioning
Append ?ref=v1.0.0 argument to the source path
Add version = "1.0.0" attribute to module block
Nothing ג€" modules stored on the public Terraform Module Registry always default to version 1.0.0
